original_title: 泥酔してヘラヘラした新人巨乳OLと上司がホテルのミスに装った相部屋で出勤直前までひたすらハメ狂い
overview: Mizuho (Miso Mizuhara), a new office lady, is kind to the director Shimokawa when she makes a mistake at work and is being preached by a senior employee. Shimokawa just plays the role of her good boss, and her actual personality is a metamorphosis that likes to smell big tits and stuffy pantyhose, and she secretly aimed at Mizuho. One day, a male employee will hold a social gathering to welcome new office lady Mizuho on a business trip. Mizuho, ​​who likes to drink liquor cheerfully, drinks up the poured liquor and crushes it.
title: Flirty Colleague With Big Boobs And Her Boss Go On A Fucking Frenzy In A Hotel Misono Mizuhara
